stories.text:
Just recently, was asking why someone found something exciting. Why are people down voting these questions?

The subject was https://www.assemblyai.com/blog/how-dall-e-2-actually-works/, someone had stated they were excited and I asked why, I got downvotes instead of answers.

Is the HN crowd unable to have a discussion? Can we get these down votes overturned?

I deleted the queries, they were obviously attracting negative emotions, I wish I could downvote people for being petty...
stories.title: Ask HN: Why are trolls down voting my questions?

stories.text:
I'm looking for an email app on desktop and mobile because the Gmail website experience sucks.

There are lots of apps out there, mostly priced. But I'm worried that my data (including email texts, attachments, contacts, calendar, etc.) will be saved on third-party servers, and I already have to grapple with that issue on Gmail.

Are there any email apps that can be trusted with our data, even if they're not free?
stories.title: Ask HN: Which email app can be trusted with my data?
